sentences.en: He gave a stark denial to the rumor.
sentences.cn: 他对谣言加以完全的否认.

sentences.en: He met the charge with a plump denial.
sentences.cn: 他断然否认对他的指控.

sentences.en: He would not break off negotiations by a sharp denial.
sentences.cn: 他不会断然拒绝对方的要求而打破谈判.

sentences.en: Her denial of my advice hurts me.
sentences.cn: 她拒绝我的忠告伤害了我.

sentences.en: His denial of our request seemed very impolite.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝我们的请求似乎很无礼.

sentences.en: His denial was not stout and quickly broke down.
sentences.cn: 他的否认并不是强有力的,而且很快就停止了.

sentences.en: His girlfriend is in denial, and refuses to admit that he will soon die.
sentences.cn: 他的女友不肯接受事实，拒不相信他很快就要死了。

sentences.en: It seems clear that despite official denials, differences of opinion lay behind the ambassador's decision to quit.
sentences.cn: 很清楚，尽管官方否认，人们对大使决定辞职还是有不同看法。
乔安娜的否认听起来像是真的。

sentences.en: Lent is a time of self - denial.
sentences.cn: 封斋期是 克己 的时期.

sentences.en: Should motherhood necessarily mean sacrifice and self-denial?
sentences.cn: 做母亲就一定要牺牲和忘我吗？

sentences.en: The clock of thought ticks out its wish and its denial.
sentences.cn: 思想的时钟滴答滴答地表达着欲望和克制.

sentences.en: The denial of these ultimates results in mass selfishness.
sentences.cn: 否定这些基本原则会导致普遍的自私.

sentences.en: The denial was bannered by the People's Daily.
sentences.cn: 《人民日报》用横贯全页的大标题报道了那项否认.

sentences.en: The denial was limited to rejecting the construction put on his remarks.
sentences.cn: 这种否认仅限于不接受对他所说话语的阐释。

sentences.en: The Foreign Ministry has issued a flat denial of any involvement.
sentences.cn: 外交部已经坚决否认参与过此事。

sentences.en: The government issued an official denial of the rumour.
sentences.cn: 政府发表了正式声明，否认谣言。
